== Main Inclusion Report for mdbtools ==

As a build dependency, only libmdbtools-dev is needed, not really needed are the mdbtools (command line tools) and the mdbtools-gmdb (viewer) packages.

# ''Availability:'' Available in universe/unstable, Arch: all
# ''Rationale:'' OOo2 build dependency
# ''Security:'' 
** No CANs
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** Needs no setup after install
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:mdbtools|Debbugs]]</nowiki>: No RC bug reports, although the bug record could have some love.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** all in main
